page.title: 17TRANSPORT PATTERNS...ROADS.
page.content: The{A548}crosses the upper section of the block and is the principal road link of the area.It carries the bulk of private and public transport along the coast.Two arterial roads run south,both joining the A547 which is in turn an artery of the A55 Chester Bangor trunk road,to be redesignated on completion of the realignment underway at present as the{A55 {EXPRESSWAY}.Both atreries are double width metalled surfaces but are undesignated.The remaining roads are service roads to residential properties but many of these are unsurfaced,the result of their unadoption due to the demise of the{ {KINMEL BAY ESTATES.}
